title: Privacy Hardening & Digital Safety
headline: Lock down your data, wherever you are.
description: We guide you remotely through privacy best practices: encrypted tools, secure browsers, VPNs, DNS filtering, and more. Take control of your digital footprint.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Your browser, apps, and operating system may be quietly sending usage data to dozens of third parties. Many of these settings can be changed—but only if you know where to look.

sections.heading: Why It Matters
sections.paragraph: Every day, your data is collected and sold. Often without your knowledge. We help you regain control through simple but powerful tools and habits.

sections.heading: What We Cover
items: Hardening mobile and desktop OS settings

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: Over a secure session, we walk you through every setting. No prior experience required—we'll explain each option clearly and make it easy to follow.
